segments.text: Good afternoon.Swiss Airline.Miss Grown speaking . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'd like to make a reservation to Los Angeles on Sep . 19th .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a moment , please . Let me check for you . ( A moment later ) Thank you for waiting . I am sorry but our flights are fully booked on that day.The next available flight leaves at 4:00 pm on 20th . Shall I reserve you a seat on it ?
segments.speaker: S1
